creator: glenn_twiggs@bmc.com
text:
Currently no property replacement is performed on messages specified in an external file or in the nested message tag. I am requesting an enhancement to perform these property replacements, and will be immediately submitting a patch. This will allow the following property replacement to work:

${release.name} Build Successful

]]> and will also perform the replacement if the mail task's messagefile attribute is set or by using the nested message tag's src attribute. I don't really care if this shows up in 1.5 beta or 1.6, although 1.5 beta would be *really* nice!
I've added the diffs for the changed java source and updated documentation.
